title: Site Administrative Assistant  Apple Services Engineering
summary: ASE Cloud, Systems and Platforms (CSP) org is searching for an Team Administrative Assistant who has a can-do attitude, is flexible, and is a thoughtful problem solver with minimal supervision. The ideal candidate will efficiently support leaders and teams and thrive in a fast-paced environment. This individual will handle calendaring, manage office spaces, order equipment, ad-hoc requests, team building & events and more. Will work closely with other Team Admins, finance, facilities, ASE Space Planning personnel to complete tasks. Passion for helping others is a must!
description:
Strong written and verbal communication and organizational skills
Experience with calendaring, PR/PO, office management
Must have outstanding time management, is highly organized, detail-oriented, and able to prioritize conflicting assignments
Demonstrates tact, discretion, and sound judgment, especially when exposed to confidential and sensitive materials
Takes initiative, is a resourceful and innovative problem solver
Able to prioritize and multitask effectively in a fast-paced environment
Displays flexibility and adaptability, positive and approachable personality
Able to work both autonomously on assignments and collaboratively with other team members
Proficient in Mac OS, Keynote, Pages, Numbers, Calendar, eApproval, Work store, Seat Manager
pay_benefits:
At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range. This provides the opportunity to progress as you grow and develop within a role. The base pay range for this role is between $34.60 and $61.50/hr, and your base pay will depend on your skills, qualifications, experience, and location.

Apple employees also have the opportunity to become an Apple shareholder through participation in Apple’s discretionary employee stock programs. Apple employees are eligible for discretionary restricted stock unit awards, and can purchase Apple stock at a discount if voluntarily participating in Apple’s Employee Stock Purchase Plan. You’ll also receive benefits including: Comprehensive medical and dental coverage, retirement benefits, a range of discounted products and free services, and for formal education related to advancing your career at Apple, reimbursement for certain educational expenses — including tuition. Additionally, this role might be eligible for discretionary bonuses or commission payments as well as relocation. Learn more about Apple Benefits.

Note: Apple benefit, compensation and employee stock programs are subject to eligibility requirements and other terms of the applicable plan or program.
